channel.title: Oh justice, where art thou?
channel.description:
Lol, I know a bunch of people agree with me here. Though I was just in IRC and got banned, probably with good reason, I just wanted to know why I got banned(the first time). Then I got banned again. So, many people(once again) agree with me that not only moparisthebest.com and the moparisthebest.com forums have corrupt staff. Now I'm not personally pointing any fingers, but you all know what I'm talking about. People getting banned for not a reason, people getting over-punished for less a reason. People being under-punished for things they should have been ip-banned for, but didn't because they have friends in high places.
All I'm saying is, this used to be a nice community, back in the day. MITB I can tell you see, exactly, what I'm talking about. You still see, that it is, what it is, in this community. But your faculty is gone down in the gutter.
Now I'm not saying that I shouldn't have been banned, but what was the point of banning my IP? Was that MITB's decision? I wouldn't be suprised... Then again the last time I talked to him he didn't use the words... "You need to learn when to shut the fuck up." When defending my own-self against the verbal attacks of said member "Unhandled".
I remember back in the day this was a proud peaceful community, where noob and fellow programmer were treated alike without question and definitely without flame, or has thou time been forgotten?
Maybe, I don't remember. Maybe, that time is completely forgotten... MAYBE... I've completely lost my mind. But then all the people I've talked to about it, since said opposition, have agreed that MITB staff is corrupt, unjust, they will ban because they can, and will be afflicted, and conflicted with reason to ban.
Then again I'm obviously just spewing out my ***.. You can ban my IP again, but I do have a router and I can keep changing it to get my message out there. I would appreciate it though, because I hate unplugging the interwebz for 10 mins :(
~That retard that got banned for defending his/herself

item.title: Oh justice, where art thou?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“stability666, post:1, topic:325591”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=294949.msg3097357#msg3097357 date=1263443182]

Trust me, not something to be proud of.

I’m quite proud of it. Every time someone looks at your signature they’ll think of my shenanigans. Ftw.
[/quote]s/shenanigans/faggotry/

You’re a fucking idiot. Lol go back to your little pussy bitch ways, frank_. I mean I must admit, I came into this argument and kept on with it cuz I was bored. But now I have better things to do, though I’m not going to let you or any other retard get the last word. Until I get banned. (Which I suggested a long time ago.) You just think you’re cool because you don’t know any better. You being adopted an all, nobody knows your mom but me. I was tappin’ her drunk ass last night. She was telling me how she gave you up because you’re such a miserable piece of fucking shit. Lolz.[/quote]

and

[quote=“stability666, post:1, topic:324526”][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=294949.msg3091445#msg3091445 date=1262918429]

At least, I’m physically fit. And are not a forty-three year old amputee named ‘Frank’.

Why bring amputee’s into this as an insult? Having someone use my disability in such a manner is extremely upsetting.
[/quote]

Sorry. It was just a random insult.

Ban me for it? ;D

Edit: Sorry I really didn’t know you were ex-staff lol I barely go on here. I’m just bored ;o

And it’s not that hard to read a java tutorial on GroupLayout.

Exactly, therefore you have failed to prove you have any intelligence whatsoever by posting that code. Thanks for proving my point.

I think i’ve proved my point. Good day to you all.

What point? All you’ve succeeded in doing is making yourself look like a complete fucking dunce.

A lesson for the higher ranks on this forum: Don’t judge a book by it’s cover; cover meaning my repz0r. ;D

I judge books by their contents, in this case your posts. Your posts in this thread alone have maxed out the monthly idiocy quota for this section, so shut the fuck up.

EDIT2:

You Obviously Dont Know Java Faggot Ur Form Is Not Even Threaded Rofl I Bet U Use Bat Files To Run It Noob Rofl

LOL. Dude, I lolirl at that statement. For one, use proper grammar. Also, didn’t you go to school? I mean you made RSBot right? You must be able to read code… Is that all though? Because your illiterate fucking ass forgot one tiny pre-written detail.

You just got fucking trolled.

“^^^^^ is not done. So don’t flame for the JPanel’s not working the way they’re supposed to.”

Get the fuck back to moparscape.

Lol.

Edit: I kinda have to make an argument here. You’re telling me that you started out programming, and NEVER read a tutorial on how to do something?

Edit2: Sorry for prefabbed convos, but I read a tutorial on using the gregorian calender class when I first started out. Me sooooo sowwi. :([/quote]

are just a few examples of the sort of person you are.

As far as your previous ban goes (which was notably only a ban from making posts and using the PM system), I was the one who put it in place.
And after reviewing your posts, I truly believe that ‘You need to learn when to shut the fuck up’ is as good a reason as any for removing you from this community.

You’re nothing but a common troll, and one of your posts above even shows you asking for a ban. While I don’t ban people ‘just because’ on request, you deserved an exception.

Read full topic

item.title: Oh justice, where art thou?
item.dc:creator: @Stability667 Stability667
item.description:
@Stability667 wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:10, topic:337400”]Last chance to answer my question. With regards to the fact that you can reset your dynamic IP to something else, all I can say is congratulations.

Of course, every time you resort to making a new account you have to start off as a nobody.
We keep tabs on all of the members that do anything notable, so you’ll have to remain a nobody if you want to avoid future bans.
If you can handle being ‘just another user’ and a level of mediocrity that nobody thinks anything of then so be it – I know better though, and that’s the problem when it comes to people who evade bans on this site; they always get caught because they just can’t let go of their previously held reputation as ‘JoeForumUser’.[/quote]

I’m not evading a ban, and I answered your question. Sorry if I have to edit my post to figure it out, most likely I have a brain disability aka I’m a fucking retard. My username was Stability666, I was banned because I was defending myself against a bunch of flame posts from “Unhandled” and a few other veteran members. (Said posts have been deleted)

Edit: “Frank_” was one of the flamers as well, not that it matters

Read full topic

item.title: Oh justice, where art thou?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Last chance to answer my question. With regards to the fact that you can reset your dynamic IP to something else, all I can say is congratulations.

Of course, every time you resort to making a new account you have to start off as a nobody.
We keep tabs on all of the members that do anything notable, so you’ll have to remain a nobody if you want to avoid future bans.
If you can handle being ‘just another user’ and a level of mediocrity that nobody thinks anything of then so be it – I know better though, and that’s the problem when it comes to people who evade bans on this site; they always get caught because they just can’t let go of their previously held reputation as ‘JoeForumUser’.

Read full topic

item.title: Oh justice, where art thou?
item.dc:creator: @Stability667 Stability667
item.description:
@Stability667 wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:8, topic:337400”][quote author=Stability667 link=topic=433802.msg3185259#msg3185259 date=1271668486]

And you are?

Absolutely nobody. A certain nobody that was personally rightfully/wrongfully banned, depending on who/how you ask.
[/quote]
A lack of a username doesn’t help me check your ban page on here for the reason provided.
Are you ikram? I wouldn’t be surprised, given that you fucked Mopman around on IRC when he wanted to know your identity and then fucked me around when I asked who you were as well.[/quote]

The hell? One person asked me who I was and then I said “Your mother” and instantly got banned. I’m not even sure if there was time to read my post. Then I never saw you on IRC and I almost want to say that the guy that banned me from the IRC wasn’t Mopman.

Stability666 was my name, if it’s that hard to figure out.

Edit: And ikram is a fucking idiot. ;p

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Stability667, post:7, topic:337400”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=433802.msg3185257#msg3185257 date=1271668390]
And you are?
[/quote]

Absolutely nobody. A certain nobody that was personally rightfully/wrongfully banned, depending on who/how you ask.[/quote]
A lack of a username doesn’t help me check your ban page on here for the reason provided.
Are you ikram? I wouldn’t be surprised, given that you fucked Mopman around on IRC when he wanted to know your identity and then fucked me around when I asked who you were as well.

item.title: Oh justice, where art thou?
item.dc:creator: @Stability667 Stability667
item.description:
@Stability667 wrote:

Lothy:

And you are?

Absolutely nobody. A certain nobody that was personally rightfully/wrongfully banned, depending on who/how you ask.

By the way, did you like recenty (In the past 5 months.) get promoted to administrator? I don’t believe you were when I got banned. O.o
Then I’m not familiar with MITB staff as it fluctuate a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Oh justice, where art thou?
item.dc:creator: @Stability667 Stability667
item.description:
@Stability667 wrote:

Speljohan:

I am only stating the facts, nothing else.

To be honest, I don’t know what

qq
nor
elitistsisthebest.com
is supposed to mean, sorry I’m not caught up with all this hip new “lingo”. Though the facts, my friend, are what I am interested in most.

Edit: My post need not be so cocky sounding, all I mean by such words is that I don’t understand what those acronyms are, and have absolutely zero idea what they mean.

Edit2: Gonna go apologize for raping “The bank”'s thread.

Read full topic
